PHRASE.LANG: This dappled glade is the ultimate chilled out place to relax and unwind surrounded by nature. It's the gift of tranquility.
Cette clairière tachetée de lumière est l'endroit parfait pour se détendre et se relaxer entouré par la nature. C'est le cadeau de la tranquillité.
Diese bunt getupfte Wiese ist der ideale Ort, um, umgeben von der Natur, zu entspannen und abzuschalten. Es ist das Geschenk der Ruhe.
Questa radura chiazzata di sole è il posto migliore dove rilassarsi circondati dalla natura. Il dono della tranquillità.
Este claro veteado es el lugar definitivo para relajarse y desconectar rodeado de naturaleza. Es el regalo de la tranquilidad.
This dappled glade is the ultimate chilled out place to relax and unwind surrounded by nature. It's the gift of tranquility.
이 얼룩배기 숲 속의 빈 터는 편안히 쉴 수 있도록 자연이 선사할 수 있는 최적의 휴식공간이라고 할 수 있죠. 고요함의 선물을 받는 거지요.
This dappled glade is the ultimate chilled out place to relax and unwind surrounded by nature. It's the gift of tranquility.
這片鳥語花香的空地環境天然，令人心曠神怡，最適合放鬆心情、好好充電，充滿寧靜祥和。
這片鳥語花香的空地環境天然，令人心曠神怡，最適合放鬆心情、好好充電，充滿寧靜祥和。
This dappled glade is the ultimate chilled out place to relax and unwind surrounded by nature. It's the gift of tranquility.
